headline: O’Reilly Automotive, Inc. Announces Dates for Its First Quarter 2025 Earnings Release and Conference Call
summary: Earnings Release Date – Wednesday, April 23, 2025, after 3:30 p.m. Central TimeConference Call Date – Thursday, April 24, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. Central Time SPRINGFIELD, Mo., April 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- O’Reilly Automotive, Inc. (the “Company” or “O’Reilly”) (Nasdaq: ORLY), a leading retailer in the automotive aftermarket industry, announces the release date for its first quarter 2025 results as Wednesday, April 23, 2025, with a conference call to follow on Thursday, April 24, 2025.
